page.title: 12 Clubs in Otley by Duncan
page.content: In our village there are lots of clubs and organisations.These include modern dancing,ballet ,brownies,cubs, football,scouts,PTA,under fives,toddlers,youth club,over 60s,bowls,drama group and gym.I go to cubs and we meet in the scout hut at six o'clock until half past seven.We play lots of games like football and we also work towards badges. At the moment our leader is Roger Arbon.There are about 12 people in our patrol.I am the sixer of the red six.Sometimes we go tracking and later on in the year there is going to be a camp.We are also going to go on a river cruise up the river Deben that is the river in Woodbridge.
